toast.invalid_form: Invalid form. Check and try again!
toast.generic_toast_error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later!
toast.user_without_permission: You are not allowed to perform this action, check with your supervisor and try again!

tooltip.user_without_permission: Actions disabled because you do not have the necessary permissions

globals.without_permission: You do not have the necessary privileges, login again or report to your superior

login.title: Horusec
login.toast_username_password_invalid: Invalid username or password, try again!
login.toast_account_not_confirmed: The account is not confirmed, check your email and try again!
login.toast_account_already_logged: The account is already logged in, please try again later!

sign_up.toast_user_exists: The email is already registered in the system!

form.toast_email_sent: Code sent to email successfully informed!

company.title: Select a company
company.modal_delete_description: Do you really want to delete the company {companyName}? This action cannot be undone!

not_found.title: Page not found!
not_found.message: The page you tried to search for does not exist. Go back to the beginning and try again!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: On this page you can analytically view the vulnerabilities of your organization or repositories.

repository.title: Repositories

table.btn_account_title: Open modal to manage user access in this repository

repository.modal_delete_repository: Do you really want to delete the {name} repository? This action cannot be undone!
repository.description: On this page, you can configure your repositories along with your access tokens and users who are allowed to analytically view the vulnerabilities of the repository

toast.user_created: User added to the repository successfully!
toast.user_deleted: User removed from the repository successfully!
toast.user_updated: User permission on the repository changed successfully!

repository.user_without_permission: You are not allowed to fetch users from this repository

tokens.content_modal_delete_token: Do you really want to delete the {description} token? This action cannot be undone!

form.created_success_description: This token grants you access to perform analysis for the selected repository! Save it in a safe place and do not share!

form.help_permission_admin:
The Administrator permission allows you to perform in the repository:
  • manage tokens
  • manage access for other users
  • view the analytic
form.help_permission_member:
The Member permission allows you to perform in the repository:
  • view the repository that he has access to
  • view the analytic

user.title: Company users

table.tooltip_disabled_action_yourself: Actions disabled because you cannot edit your user

form.help_permission_admin:
The Administrator permission allows you to perform on the system:
  • manage company users
  • manage repositories
  • view all available analytics
form.help_permission_member:
The permission of Member allows the system to perform:
  • view the repositories it has access to
  • view the company's analytics
  • view the analytics of the repository that he has access to

user.modal_delete_user: Do you really want to delete the user {username} ? This action cannot be undone!

toast.user_created: Invited user! Check the email to confirm the invitation.
toast.user_not_found: The informed email does not exist in the system!
toast.user_deleted: The user has been successfully deleted!
toast.user_already_exist: The informed user is already registered with the company!

user.description: On this page you can manage the users who have access to that company to be able to view the dashboard. Another feature is that with the permission of the administrator you can manage repositories and users of this company.
